name: Anti-Love Arrow
description:
Premise

Love is in the air since your rival from the Cupid Academy has started firing her arrows at random pedestrians.  As the top alumni from the Anti-Cupid College of Dislike, you should probably stop her from spreading this love around. 

Controls 

Left mouse click -  Click and hold to shoot arrows

Things To Do

Shoot pedestrians to make them dislike each other and make sure more people hate each other before the time's up.
